title: Had a rough week. I could use some kind words.
comments: Loving that smile and those eyes!!!!! Heaven

title: I’ve been really anxious recently so I went and got a new dress to help distract myself from… well myself lol. Please remember to treat yourself once in a while and take care :)
Baggy sweaters are the best !
comments: That sweater looks mad cozy, I love it.

title: My boyfriend is an unapologetic jerk and the reason that I hardly sleep. Please say something nice to me as if you were my partner :’)
comments: You should leave him if this is how you feel. Things will get better!

You really think it's a healthy situation to be losing sleep over someone irl, while asking internet strangers to give you compliments to feel better?

You're a little too good looking for nonsense.

I am married so I am not going to do that exactly, but I will provide the following.  You seem like beautiful young lady inside and out, and if the man you are with does not understand that, then you should move on to someone who does.

title: I’m feeling good today ^-^
comments: Your outfit looks absolutely stunning! I hope you have a fantastic evening! 💓💓
